subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
This same thing could be said by EVP/ITC researchers about you Al.

At least the good people of this list and those around me can actually  
hear and see what I record and experience real paranormal phenomenon.  
Not always with a radio mind you. Not all of us use DRV for  
communication.

I'd call it ludicrous to take what a self proclaimed "medium" says,  
which on average and from years of research, has been found to be rare  
to have a high degree of any ability, over what a person can actually  
hear and see, but hey, that's just from a silly scientific point of  
view.

w.
